articles.author: Phate Zhang
articles.title: Leapmotor reportedly begins EV production at Stellantis' Polish plant - CnEVPost
articles.description: Leapmotor's first T03 small EVs rolled off Stellantis' assembly plant in Poland last week and were on schedule for mass production in September, according to Reuters.
